ISSUE.TITLE: Multiple clicks on "fork" button should generate only one query
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: > "Bug / indicator required - I've hit the fork 3 times in a row cause I wasn't patient, and I got 3 queries that immediately started executing (heavy ones I presume)" Also maybe we should show a load indicator (related to #24).
